module » dkernel

dkernel.js File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains the methods for preparing the browser workspace for any visual tasks.

Note:
Wednus Control: An object with three essential properties: .body, .core, and .wps. .body is the shell (visible) of the presentation layer. .core is the core (abstract: non-visible) of the control .wps is the WPS set value.
Author:
Sundew H. Shin
Todo:
check samples on IE

Definition at line 15 of file dkernel.js.

W refresh

Initial value:

 function(){
  var db = document.body;
  if(window.innerWidth != null){
    this.width = window.innerWidth;
    this.height = window.innerHeight;
  }else if(window.opera != null){
    this.width = db.clientWidth;
    this.height = db.clientHeight;
  }else if(document.documentE1lement != null){  
    this.width = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
    this.height = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
  }
  
  this.width = parseInt(this.width);
  this.height = parseInt(this.height);
  
  this.body.style.width = this.width +'px';
  this.body.style.height = this.height +'px';
}
Refresh the browser workarea size properties.

See also:
http://www.softcomplex.com/docs/get_window_size_and_scrollbar_position.html

Definition at line 23 of file dkernel.js.

W scroll

Initial value:

 function(isAuto){
  if(isAuto){
    document.write('<style>html {overflow: auto;}<\/style>');
    
  }else document.write('<style>html {overflow: hidden;}<\/style>');
    
    
  document.close();
}
Browser scrollbar setting.

IE doesn't understand document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'

Parameters:
value true for 'auto', false for 'hidden'
See also:
http://www.noscope.com/journal/2004/02/horizontal_scrollbar_bug

http://www.jslint.com/lint.html

Note:
Opera doesn't support overflow-x and overflow-y yet.

Definition at line 53 of file dkernel.js.

W background

Initial value:

 function(bg){
  if(!bg) return;
  document.body.style.background = bg;
}

Definition at line 64 of file dkernel.js.

W init

Initial value:

 function(){
  
  for(var i in window) W.names += i +',';

  
  this.body = document.createElement('div');
  
  this.body.style.display = 'inline';
  
  if(!document.body){
    document.write('<div id="_wednus_platform_" style="display:none;'
    +'position:absolute;">.</div>');
  }
  document.body.appendChild(this.body);

  
  this.code = document.createElement('textarea');
  this.code.style.display = 'none';
  document.body.appendChild(this.code);
  
  this.scroll(false);
  
  this.refresh();

  
  if(this.path == '') this.autopath();
}
Init.

platform as performing:

  • Build the available namespace name library,
  • Prepare the presentation base,
  • Prepare the code holder (textarea),
  • Refresh screen info., and
  • Get the W.path if it's from wednus_compact.js.
